item.description:
Heat Yoga anyone?

 

Let's go to a class at Maine Bikram Yoga!

 

I set the meetup time for 6pm, because you'll want to get there early. The class fills up fast. This will give you enough time to meet the group outside the entrance promptly at 6pm, sign in, pay (and fill out paperwork if you're new to yoga), change, and warm up before class begins! Check out their website below for more details:

http://www.mainebikramyoga.com/

 

Where to meet the group: Meet us outside the entrance at 6pm. We'll head in to get ready at 6:05pm sharp.

 

Cost: $16 + the $1 meetup fee

 

First Time? Yes, you CAN attend if you've never been before. This class is designed for all levels of practice. If this is your first time trying heat yoga, please remember to stay hydrated with plenty of water throughout the day BEFORE you attend class. You'll want to bring water and a towel to the class as well as a change of clothes. Please read the following page on their website for more details if you've never been before:

http://www.mainebikramyoga.com/faq/
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet outside the entrance at 6pm. Class starts at 6:30, but you'll have to sign in, pay, change, and warm up before class.
item.name: Heat Yoga!
